Description.Text: This resort on Gili Trawangan is easily reached over sea in about two hours on the fast boats that run daily. Guests can also arrive by air from Bali to Lombok in about 20 minutes with transfer by boat from Lombok to Gili Trawangan on the hotel's private boat. Gili Beach and the tourist centre are about 400 metres from the resort.

The en suite rooms feature contemporary furnishings and local ethnic pieces of art. Each comes with an elegant walled shower, hairdryer, bathrobe, king-size bed, tea and coffee making facilities, and terrace. Furthermore, the rooms feature a spacious living room with international satellite/cable TV, a direct dial telephone, CD/DVD player, safe, minibar and individually regulated air conditioning.

This resort consists of 16 enchanting rooms, nestled in a unique atmosphere distinguished by style and design. Facilities in the resort include a lobby, TV lounge, bar, restaurant, room service, laundry service (for a fee) and bicycle hire.
